SEARCH
Module JTrashFX
Package application.view

Class Mano

java.lang.Object
application.view.Mano
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class Mano extends Object implements Observer
This class is the collector of imageView of cards on the playing table
Author:
Luigi Pennisi

  • Constructor Details

    • Mano

      public Mano(int playerIndex, javafx.scene.image.ImageView... mano)
      Constructor of Mano
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - is an index to understand the owner of the mano or if it's the center of the table (discard and card to play)
      mano - is the array of ImageView that the class manage

  • Method Details

    • getCardPath

      public static final String getCardPath(Carta card)
      This method return the relative path of a card got in input. The path is set to work with the current directory deployment
      Parameters:
      card - is The card which return the path
      Returns:
      path as String

    • update

      public void update(Observable o, Object arg)
      Specified by:

    • refreshCard

      public void refreshCard(int i)
      This method refresh the view of a specific card by the index
      Parameters:
      i - is the index of the card to refresh if are card of hands else it's needed to understand if refresh the cardToPlay(i=1) or the discardPile(i=0)
